auth.registerSubtitle: Create your account and start expanding your network.
auth.termsAgreement: By registering, you agree to our
auth.description: 323 Network connects Brazilians in the United States who seek business opportunities, strategic partnerships, and professional growth. We act as a relationship and business hub, creating an environment where qualified connections drive projects, companies, and the construction of the American Dream.
auth.emailNotConfirmedMessage: The email {email} has not been confirmed yet. Please check your inbox and click the confirmation link we sent.
auth.loginErrorMessage: Unable to login. Please check your credentials and try again.
auth.verifyInboxInstructions: Check your inbox and click the confirmation link we sent. If you don't find the email, also check your spam folder.
auth.verificationEmailSent: We sent a verification email to
auth.checkInboxInstructions: Please check your inbox and click the confirmation link to activate your account. If you don't find the email, also check your spam folder.
auth.verifyBeforeLogin: You'll need to verify your email before logging in for the first time.
auth.emailNecessaryMessage: Please enter your email in the login field before resending.
auth.emailResentMessage: We sent a new confirmation email to {email}. Check your inbox and also the spam folder.
auth.resendErrorMessage: Unable to resend the email. Please try again later or contact support.
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.forgotPasswordSubtitle: Don't worry! We'll send you instructions to reset your password.
auth.emailSentMessage: Check your inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password.
auth.resetPasswordDescription: Enter your new password to continue.
auth.passwordChangedMessage: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now log in.
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.resetPasswordError: Error resetting password. Please try again.

services.title: Services
services.description: Find specialized services for Brazilians in the USA.
services.noServicesFound: No services found in this category.
services.noServicesFoundDesc: You haven't purchased any services yet.
services.heroDescription: Access a network of premium services: simplified bureaucracy, marketing strategies, and high-level connections to accelerate your success.
services.businessOpeningDesc: Register your business in the USA legally and quickly.
services.personalBrandingDesc: Build your authority in the American market.
services.conciergeDescription: Our concierge team can help you find exactly what you need.
services.partnerContact: The responsible partner will contact you shortly.
services.pixConversion: Amount converted from USD to BRL using an exchange rate of R$ {rate}.
services.requestPlaceholder: Tell us a bit about your needs...
services.step1Desc: Browse through our curated premium services. From business formation to visas and marketing, we select only the best partners.
services.step2Desc: Interested? Click request. We don't charge anything upfront. Our team connects you directly with the specialist.
services.step3Desc: As a member of 323 Network, you guarantee exclusive discounts and priority VIP service from all partners.
services.mustBeLoggedInToContract: You must be logged in to contract a service.
services.mustBeLoggedInToRequest: You must be logged in to request a service.
services.requestSuccess: Request sent successfully! The partner will contact you shortly.
services.requestError: Error sending request. Please try again later.
services.checkoutError: Error processing payment. Please try again.
services.testimonialLucas: "The assistance in opening my LLC was impeccable. In 2 weeks I was already operating legally in Florida."
services.testimonialAmanda: "The VIP networking opened doors that would have taken me years to achieve alone. Worth every penny."
services.testimonialBeatriz: "I managed to organize my visa strategy with the mentoring. I felt much more secure to apply."
